tagline: Repealing the Establishment of the Federal Bank for Cooperatives and Regulation of Cooperative Banking Act, 1977

Page 2 of 2 
 THE ESTABLISHMENT OF THE FEDERAL BANK FOR COOPERATIVES 
AND REGULATION OF COOPERATIVE BANKING (REPEAL) ACT, 2018  
ACT NO. XXVI OF 2018  
[18th May, 2018]  
An Act to repeal the Establishment of the Federal Bank for Cooperatives and Regulation of 
Cooperative Bank ing Act, 1977  
WHEREAS it is expedient to repeal the Establishment of the Federal Bank for  Cooperatives 
and Regulation of Cooperative Banking Act, 1977 (IX of 1977) for the purpose hereinafter appearing;  
It is hereby enacted as follows: — 
1.  Short title and  commencement .— (1) This Act may be called the Establishment of the 
Federal Bank for Cooperatives and Regulation of Cooperative Banking (Repeal) Act, 2018.  
(2)  It shall come into force at once.  
2.  Repeal.  The Establishment of the Federal Bank for Coopera tives and Regulation of 
Cooperative Banking Act, 1977 (IX of 1977), is hereby repealed.  
 
___________
